price: Shin, sunã da wani abin bautãwa ne wanda bã Allah ba? Tsarki ya tabbata ga Allah daga abin da suke yi na shirki!
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: am lahum ilāhun ghayru al-lahi sub'ḥāna al-lahi ʿammā yush'rikūna
